bibl.title: The Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri. Descriptions and Texts of Twelve Manuscripts on Papyrus of the Greek Bible. Fasciculus I. General Introduction.
bibl.note: Exemples des diverses écritures. - Sur l'ensemble des P. Chester Beatty, voir van Haelst 7.
bibl.seg: Kenyon Frederic G., The Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri. Descriptions and Texts of Twelve Manuscripts on Papyrus of the Greek Bible. Fasciculus I. General Introduction.
London, E. Walker, 1933, 4°, 18 pp. et 12 pll.
